import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './all.css'; import Avatar from "react-avatar"; import axios from 'axios'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; function ListUser() { const [list, setList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getUser(); }, []) const getUser = async()=>{ try { const getBlog = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/api/users'); console.log(getBlog.data); setList(getBlog.data); } catch (error) { console.log(error.message); } } const listBlog = list.map((e)=>{ return ( 1 {e.name} {e.email} {e.phone} {e.message} ) }) return (
